content.rendered:
Host ukrainian refugees

More than 11 million people have fled their homes in Ukraine since the war began, according to the United Nations. As well as the 5.1 million who have left for neighboring countries, another 6.5 million people are thought to be displaced inside the war-torn country itself.

While the majority of Ukrainian refugees fled to the neighboring European countries, still many of them went as far as the Middle East, the USA, Australia, Canada, and other countries.

Volunteer by providing temporary housing to Ukrainian families in your country. Submit your application at the websites below:

  • https://www.host4ukraine.com/
  • https://www.ukrainetakeshelter.com/
  • https://wehelpukraine.org/
  • https://mapahelp.me/
  • https://www.shelter4ua.com/en
  • https://prykhystok.in.ua/

With your help, we will definitely win this war and achieve peace.

Glory to Ukraine!
